Room.Name: Tower Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: A three-way split in the tunnel appears to be in the northwest direction.
Room.LongDescription: Nothing but darkness and an occasional scraping sound is in the oppoisite direction. There is also that constant sound of dripping water. There are some odd scratchings on the wall, and an arrow to the southeast, but it was evidently put there a long time ago, and now it's unreadable.
